00054     ResourceManager::ResourceManager(const std::string &path)
00055     {
00056         mDefaultBody = 0;
00057         mDefaultHair = 0;
00058         mBodyWidth = 0;
00059         mBodyHeight = 0;
00060         // physfs code
00061         PHYSFS_init(path.c_str());
00062 
00063 #ifndef __APPLE__
00064         mDataPath = "data/";
00065         PHYSFS_addToSearchPath("data", 0);
00066 #else
00067         //TODO: Add OSX support
00068 #endif
00069     }
00070 
00071     ResourceManager::~ResourceManager()
00072     {
00073         {
00074             BodyPartItr itr = mBodyParts.begin(), itr_end = mBodyParts.end();
00075             while (itr != itr_end)
00076             {
00077                 delete (*itr);
00078                 ++itr;
00079             }
00080             mBodyParts.clear();
00081         }
00082 
00083         {
00084             AnimationItr itr = mAnimations.begin(), itr_end = mAnimations.end();
00085             while (itr != itr_end)
00086             {
00087                 std::list<BeingAnimation*>::iterator bitr = itr->second.begin(),
00088                                                  bitr_end = itr->second.end();
00089                 while (bitr != bitr_end)
00090                 {
00091                     delete *bitr;
00092                     ++bitr;
00093                 }
00094                 ++itr;
00095             }
00096             mAnimations.clear();
00097         }
00098 
00099         // remember to deinit physfs
00100         PHYSFS_deinit();
00101     }

00104     void ResourceManager::loadBodyParts(const std::string &filename)
00105     {
00106         XMLFile file;
00107                 if (file.load(filename))
00108                 {
00109                     // set size
00110                     file.setElement("size");
00111                     mBodyWidth = file.readInt("size", "width");
00112                     mBodyHeight = file.readInt("size", "height");
00113 
00114             // set defaults
00115             file.setElement("default");
00116                     mDefaultBody = file.readInt("default", "body");
00117             mDefaultFemale = file.readInt("default", "female");
00118                     mDefaultHair = file.readInt("default", "hair");
00119 
00120             // add all the body parts
00121             file.setElement("body");
00122             do
00123             {
00124                 int id = file.readInt("body", "id");
00125                 std::string img = mDataPath + file.readString("body", "file");
00126                 std::string icon = mDataPath + file.readString("body", "icon");
00127                 int part = file.readInt("body", "part");
00128 
00129                 BodyPart *body = new BodyPart(id, part, img, icon);
00130 
00131                 mBodyParts.push_back(body);
00132             } while (file.next("body"));
00133                 }
00134     }
00135 
00136     void ResourceManager::loadAnimations(const std::string &filename)
00137     {
00138         XMLFile file;
00139                 if (file.load(filename))
00140                 {
00141                     // add all the animations
00142                     file.setElement("animation");
00143                     file.setSubElement("animation", "body");
00144             do
00145             {
00146                 int id = file.readInt("animation", "id");
00147                 std::string name = file.readString("animation", "name");
00148                 int frames = file.readInt("animation", "frames");
00149                 int width = file.readInt("animation", "width");
00150                 int height = file.readInt("animation", "height");
00151 
00152                 // get list of animations for each body part
00153                 std::list<BeingAnimation*> animList;
00154                 do
00155                 {
00156                     std::string img = mDataPath + file.readString("body", "file");
00157                     int part = file.readInt("body", "part");
00158 
00159                     std::stringstream texName;
00160                     texName << part << name;
00161 
00162                     // load in all the frames of animation
00163                     if (graphicsEngine->loadTextureSet(texName.str(), img, width, height))
00164                     {
00165                         BeingAnimation *anim = new BeingAnimation(id, part);
00166                         for (unsigned int i = 1; i <= frames; ++i)
00167                         {
00168                             std::stringstream str;
00169                             str << texName.str() << i;
00170                             anim->addTexture(graphicsEngine->getTexture(str.str()));
00171                         }
00172                         animList.push_back(anim);
00173                     }
00174                 } while (file.next("body"));
00175 
00176                 mAnimations.insert(std::pair<std::string, std::list<BeingAnimation*> >(name, animList));
00177 
00178             } while (file.next("animation"));
00179         }
00180     }

00184         return mBodyWidth;

00188     {
00189         return mBodyHeight;

00192     BodyPart* ResourceManager::getBodyPart(int id)
00193     {
00194         BodyPartItr itr = mBodyParts.begin(), itr_end = mBodyParts.end();
00195         while (itr != itr_end)
00196         {
00197             if ((*itr)->getId() == id)
00198             {
00199                 return *itr;
00200             }
00201 
00202             ++itr;
00203         }
00204 
00205         return NULL;
00206     }
00207 
00208     BodyPart* ResourceManager::getDefaultBody(int type)
00209     {
00210         switch (type)
00211         {
00212         case PART_BODY:
00213             return getBodyPart(mDefaultBody);
00214         case PART_HAIR:
00215             return getBodyPart(mDefaultHair);
00216         }
00217 
00218         return NULL;
00219     }
00220 
00221     BodyPart* ResourceManager::getFemaleBody()
00222     {
00223         return getBodyPart(mDefaultFemale);
00224     }
00225 
00226     std::vector<BodyPart*> ResourceManager::getBodyList(int type)
00227     {
00228         std::vector<BodyPart*> vec;
00229 
00230         BodyPartItr itr = mBodyParts.begin(), itr_end = mBodyParts.end();
00231         while (itr != itr_end)
00232         {
00233             if ((*itr)->getType() == type)
00234             {
00235                 vec.push_back(*itr);
00236             }
00237 
00238             ++itr;
00239         }
00240 
00241         return vec;
00242     }
00243 
00244     Animation* ResourceManager::getAnimation(int part, const std::string &name)
00245     {
00246         AnimationItr itr = mAnimations.find(name);
00247         if (itr != mAnimations.end())
00248         {
00249             std::list<BeingAnimation*>::iterator bitr = itr->second.begin(),
00250                                                  bitr_end = itr->second.end();
00251             while (bitr != bitr_end)
00252             {
00253                 if ((*bitr)->getPart() == part)
00254                 {
00255                     return *bitr;
00256                 }
00257                 ++bitr;
00258             }
00259         }
00260 
00261         return NULL;
00262     }
00263 
00264     std::string ResourceManager::getDataPath()
00265     {
00266         return mDataPath;
00267     }

00269     bool ResourceManager::doesExist(const std::string &filename)
00270     {
00271         return (PHYSFS_exists(filename.c_str()) != 0);
00272     }
